buildCommand: if [ -d apps/webapp ]; then rm -rf apps/webapp/node_modules && npm run build -w webapp; else (cd ../.. && rm -rf apps/webapp/node_modules && npm run build -w webapp); fi
installCommand: if [ -d apps/webapp ]; then npm install && npm install @rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu --no-save; else (cd ../.. && npm install && npm install @rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu --no-save); fi
